import { Avatar, Button, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import { PersonAdd } from '@material-ui/icons' import BusStyle from '../style/BusStyle' import AddDriverAssistant from './AddDriverAssistant' import {openDialog} from '../../../../state/AppAction' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' const DriverAndAssistant =(props)=>{ const classes = BusStyle() const bus = props.bus const dispatch = useDispatch() const addDriver =(placeholder)=>{ const showData={ show:true, title:`Assign driver for ${bus.number}`, page: } dispatch(openDialog(showData)) } return (
{ bus.driver===null ? (
Driver is not assigned
) : (
{bus.driver.name.charAt(0)} {bus.driver.name} {bus.driver.phone}
) } { bus.assistant===null ? (
Assistant is not assigned
) : (
{bus.driver.name.charAt(0)} {bus.driver.name} {bus.driver.phone}
) }
) } export default DriverAndAssistant
